text: Resident Evil 5, known in Japan as , is a survival horror video game that was made by Capcom for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 game consoles. It is the seventh game in the Resident Evil video game series for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.Staff, GameSpot.com, Takeuchi talks Resident Evil 5 (August 2, 2005), GameSpot. Retrieved on February 19, 2007. It was released on March 5, 2009 in Japan and on March 13, 2009 in North America and Europe for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 and on September 2009 for Microsoft Windows.Staff, ign.com, Resident Evil 5 Demo Hits Next Week (November 26, 2008), IGN. title: Resident Evil 5
